Address.label: Address
Address.value: PINEAPPLE BUSINESS PARK,OFFICE NUMBER 2, P.O. BOX N-624, NASSAU, Bahamas

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: OneSpaWorld Holdings Ltd is an operator of health and wellness centers onboard cruise ships and operator of health and wellness centers at destination resorts worldwide. It offers a suite of premium health, fitness, beauty, and wellness services and products. The services provided by the company include body, salon, and skincare services and products, fitness classes and personal fitness training and pain management, detoxifying programs, and comprehensive body composition analyses among others. The company has only one single segment of Maritime and Destination Resorts.
